page.title: 08Life in Colaton Raleigh
page.content: Colaton Raleigh is a small village. It is a beautiful place but most of the children think there is not much to do.There are discos sometimes but not many people go to them!Colaton Raleigh is mostly grassland and farmland. Perhaps you should enjoy living in the country to be happy living there.There is is a beautiful little church.My Mum and Dad would prefer to live nearer my school which is in Sidmouth. I would prefer to live nearer my friends in Sidford, Sidbury and Sidmouth.
